phrs.translation: n. 一种英国的小猎犬

sentences.sentence: Cavalier King Charles Spaniels have an inherited form of this disease.
sentences.translation: 查理斯王小猎犬具有遗传性退行性二尖瓣病变。

sentences.sentence: Spaniels are excellent for finding game and flushing it out of any hiding place.
sentences.translation: 正在寻找优秀服勤游戏和冲洗出来的任何藏身之地。

sentences.sentence: Her only friend is her dog, Elvis, one of the Boykin spaniels her family raises.
sentences.translation: 她的家里养了一些波尔金猎狗，其中一只名叫埃尔维斯的小狗是艾米丽唯一的朋友。
